briefdescription.para: Opens the calibration window for Kilobots.
Sends a UID (unique ID) command to the overhead controller for calibration.

detaileddescription.para:
Publishes a CALIB_UID message with the given UID value.
x
Unique ID for calibration.

briefdescription.para: Sends a left turn calibration value to the overhead controller.

detaileddescription.para:
Publishes a CALIB_TURN_LEFT message with the specified left turn value.
x
Left turn calibration value.

briefdescription.para: Sends a right turn calibration value to the overhead controller.

detaileddescription.para:
Publishes a CALIB_TURN_RIGHT message with the specified right turn value.
x
Right turn calibration value.

briefdescription.para: Sends a straight movement calibration value to the overhead controller.

detaileddescription.para:
Publishes a CALIB_STRAIGHT message with left and right calibration values packed in x.
x
Straight calibration value (lower and upper bytes).

briefdescription.para: Sends a save command to the overhead controller for calibration.

detaileddescription.para: Publishes a CALIB_SAVE message via the overhead controller.

briefdescription.para: Stops the calibration routine.

detaileddescription.para: Currently only contains commented-out code for sending wakeup messages. Intended for future use.

briefdescription.para: Updates the positions of arena markers and the experimental field rectangle.

detaileddescription.para: Computes positions of the 4 arena markers based on the current marker0 position and arena width. Also updates bottom-right marker and experiment field rectangle.

briefdescription.para: Handles the "Debug" checkbox click event.

detaileddescription.para: Updates the DebugAv state according to the debugAV_CheckBox status.

briefdescription.para: Handles keyboard input and triggers corresponding robot and UI actions.

detaileddescription.para:
Supported keys and actions:
W (87), presenter Left (16777238): Move kilobot(s) forward.
A (65): Move kilobot(s) left.
D (68), presenter Right (16777239): Move kilobot(s) right.
S (83), B (66): Stop kilobot(s).
V (86): Increase V slider.
C (67): Decrease V slider.
X (88): Stop sending messages.
Z (90): Put kilobot(s) to sleep.
N (78): Run kilobot(s).
M (77): Reset kilobot(s).
I (73): Press black button (UI).
K (75): Toggle heatmap display (UI).
R (82): Reset heatmap.
L (76): Shuffle image experiment field.
2 (50): Move marker0 down.
8 (56): Move marker0 up.
4 (52): Move marker0 left.
6 (54): Move marker0 right.
3 (51): Cycle experiment field type.

parameterdescription.para: The integer key code received from the keyboard event.

briefdescription.para: Override Qt key press handler.

detaileddescription.para: Handles application-level keyboard shortcuts such as quitting the app with 'Esc'.

briefdescription.para: Handles Arena window open/close button click.

detaileddescription.para: Shows or hides the Arena window and updates the button label accordingly. Moves the window to the selected screen when opening.

briefdescription.para: Updates colors for field or robots based on current GUI slider values.

detaileddescription.para: Depending on the selected object type (background, robot custom, or pen), updates color in the world model.

briefdescription.para: Updates color sliders and field/robot color from a color string.

detaileddescription.para:
Converts a given color string (e.g., from a button) to HSV slider values, then updates the world model colors.
colorString
The color string (e.g., "#RRGGBB" or named color) to use.

briefdescription.para: Updates all slider labels with current slider values.

detaileddescription.para: Synchronizes displayed numeric values for HSV sliders, kilobot tracker sliders, and LED detection sliders.

briefdescription.para: Sets sliders to a predefined red color and updates the interface.

detaileddescription.para: Applies a preset HSV value for red, updates sliders, and triggers color update.

briefdescription.para: Sets sliders to a predefined blue color and updates the interface.

detaileddescription.para: Applies a preset HSV value for blue, updates sliders, and triggers color update.

briefdescription.para: Toggles the Arena window fullscreen mode.

detaileddescription.para: Puts the Arena window into fullscreen and brings the main window to front.

briefdescription.para: Handles the 'Fit Rect' button click event.

detaileddescription.para: Disables the button to prevent repeated clicks. Intended to fit the scene rectangle in the arena window (currently commented out).

briefdescription.para: Handles the 'From Image' button click event.

detaileddescription.para: Disables the button to prevent repeated clicks. Intended for toggling loading/cleaning of a background image in the arena window (logic currently commented out).

briefdescription.para: Handles the 'Save Setting' button click event.

detaileddescription.para: Triggers saving of GUI and user settings.

briefdescription.para: Handles the 'Load Setting' button click event.

detaileddescription.para: Loads GUI and user settings from disk.

briefdescription.para: Handles the 'Start Tracking' button click event.

detaileddescription.para: Starts or stops the tracking loop and updates button/text states accordingly.

briefdescription.para: Updates the 'Start Tracking' button label.

detaileddescription.para: Changes the button text based on its checked state.

briefdescription.para: Handles the 'Detect Kilobots' button click event.

detaileddescription.para: Initiates kilobot detection, updates the combo box for selection, and manages start tracking button states.

briefdescription.para: Handles the crop button click event to define or clear the cropping rectangle.

detaileddescription.para: When enabled, calculates crop rectangle coordinates based on UI fields or detected markers, maps cropping region between GUI, fit, and capture coordinates, and updates internal state. When disabled, resets cropping to the full capture region. Always triggers an update in the tracker and resets the heatmap.

briefdescription.para: Handles the 'Detect Marker' button click event to find ArUco markers in the current video frame.

detaileddescription.para: Processes the current frame using OpenCV's ArUco detection tools. If markers are found, their positions and bounding rectangles are extracted and stored in internal lists, and details are printed for debugging. Calls findMarkerRect() to update arena mapping based on detected marker locations.

briefdescription.para: Handles the marker width slider movement.

detaileddescription.para:
Updates the world model marker length parameter according to the slider position.
position
New slider value for marker width.

briefdescription.para: Handles state change for the tracker debug checkbox.

detaileddescription.para:
Enables or disables debug drawing in the tracker.
arg1
State change value (unused).

briefdescription.para: Handles the max displacement slider movement.

detaileddescription.para:
Updates the tracker maximum allowed displacement parameter for object tracking.
position
New slider value.

briefdescription.para: Handles the EFWL slider movement.

detaileddescription.para:
Updates the EFWL (e.g., Exponential Forgetting Window Length) parameter in the tracker.
position
New slider value.

briefdescription.para: Handles the robot rendering radius slider movement.

detaileddescription.para:
Updates the robot rendering radius in the world model for visualization.
position
New slider value for robot radius.

briefdescription.para: Handles the smoothness factor slider movement.

detaileddescription.para:
Updates the tracker smoothing parameter for object trajectories.
position
New slider value.

briefdescription.para: Handles toggling of the image-based experiment field.

detaileddescription.para:
Loads a background image for the experiment field if enabled.
checked
True if button is checked (enabled).

briefdescription.para: Handles initialization of points to draw (e.g., grid, star).

detaileddescription.para:
Generates and sets up points for drawing, according to the selected mode.
checked
True if button is checked (enabled).

briefdescription.para: Handles the reset trace button click event.

detaileddescription.para: Clears the robot traces stored in the world model.

briefdescription.para: Handles the state change event for the 'Draw Trace' checkbox.

detaileddescription.para:
Updates the drawTrace flag in the world model according to the UI checkbox.
arg1
State value (unused).

briefdescription.para: Randomizes and loads a background image for the experimental field.

detaileddescription.para: Selects a random arena image from a set of predefined files and loads it into the world model.

briefdescription.para: Handles the state change event for the 'Draw Boundary' checkbox.

detaileddescription.para:
Updates the drawBoundary flag in the world model according to the UI checkbox.
arg1
State value (unused).

briefdescription.para: Handles the 'Draw Heatmap' checkbox click event.

detaileddescription.para: Updates the drawHeatMap flag in the world model according to the UI checkbox.

briefdescription.para: Handles the 'Draw Colored Circles' checkbox click event.

detaileddescription.para:
Updates the drawColCircles flag in the world model.
checked
True if the checkbox is checked.

briefdescription.para: Handles the 'Sea Blue' color preset button click.

detaileddescription.para: Sets the HSV sliders to a predefined 'sea blue' value and updates colors in the interface.

briefdescription.para: Handles the 'Draw Robot Circles' checkbox click event.

detaileddescription.para:
Toggles drawing of robot circles in the visualization.
checked
True if the checkbox is checked (enabled).

briefdescription.para: Handles the 'Set Program' button click for the overhead controller.

detaileddescription.para: Logs an action for loading a .hex file to program the Kilobots.

briefdescription.para: Handles the 'Write Log' button click event.

detaileddescription.para:
Starts or stops logging experiment data to a file based on the checked state. Sets up file streams and connects/disconnects relevant signals for different logging modes.
checked
True if logging is enabled.

briefdescription.para: Handles the "Environment 2" radio button click event.

detaileddescription.para:
Sets predefined marker positions and cropping rectangle for environment 2.
checked
True if the radio button is checked.

briefdescription.para: Handles the "Environment 1" radio button click event.

detaileddescription.para:
Sets predefined marker positions and cropping rectangle for environment 1.
checked
True if the radio button is checked.

briefdescription.para: Opens a file dialog to select an arena image.

detaileddescription.para: Loads the selected arena image and updates the corresponding UI field.

briefdescription.para: Handles the "Environment 3" radio button click event.

detaileddescription.para: Sets predefined marker positions and cropping rectangle for environment 3.

briefdescription.para: Handles the "Environment 4" radio button click event (Thymio arena).

detaileddescription.para: Sets marker positions and cropping rectangle for the largest Thymio arena.

briefdescription.para: Handles the "Gradient Experiment Field" button click event.

detaileddescription.para: Triggers an update of the gradient painter in the arena window.

briefdescription.para: Handles the noise tiles slider value change event.

detaileddescription.para:
Updates the number of noise tiles in the world model.
value
New number of noise tiles.

briefdescription.para: Handles the noise frequency slider value change event.

detaileddescription.para:
Updates the noise time interval in the world model and environment brain.
value
New noise frequency value.

briefdescription.para: Handles the noise strength slider value change event.

detaileddescription.para:
Updates the noise strength parameter in the world model.
value
New noise strength value.

briefdescription.para: Handles the "Draw Network" checkbox state change event.

detaileddescription.para:
Updates the drawNetwork flag in the world model.
arg1
State value (unused).

briefdescription.para: Handles the value change for a dummy/random slider.

detaileddescription.para:
Updates a dummy variable in the world model. Used for testing or prototyping.
value
New slider value.

briefdescription.para: Handles the noise radio button click event.

detaileddescription.para:
Connects or disconnects noise addition in the environment brain. Also updates noise interval.
checked
True if the radio button is checked (enabled).

briefdescription.para: Handles the 'Draw Centroid' checkbox state change event.

detaileddescription.para:
Updates the drawCentroid flag in the world model according to the UI checkbox.
arg1
State value (unused).

briefdescription.para: Handles the 'Draw Voronoii' checkbox state change event.

detaileddescription.para:
Updates the drawVoronoii flag in the world model according to the UI checkbox.
arg1
State value (unused).

briefdescription.para: Handles the 'Draw Bots Colors' checkbox state change event.

detaileddescription.para:
Updates the drawWithColors flag in the world model according to the UI checkbox.
arg1
State value (unused).

briefdescription.para: Handles the value change for a dummy/random slider (slider 1).

detaileddescription.para:
Updates a second dummy variable in the world model. Used for testing or prototyping.
value
New slider value.

briefdescription.para: Handles the 'Draw Spatial Network' checkbox state change event.

detaileddescription.para:
Updates the spatialNetwork flag in the world model according to the UI checkbox.
arg1
State value (unused).

briefdescription.para: Handles the 'Draw Ball' checkbox state change event.

detaileddescription.para:
Updates the drawBall flag in the world model according to the UI checkbox.
arg1
State value (unused).

briefdescription.para: Constructs the main application window.

detaileddescription.para: Main constructor for the MainWindow class.

parent
Pointer to parent widget (default nullptr).
Initializes the GUI, sets up the camera environment, tracking modules, and the arena window. Handles conditional compilation for different camera types, UI setup, and initial state definitions. Assumes a multi-screen setup; positions main window on primary screen and maximizes it.

inbodydescription.para: Ensures that marker data is in a known default state to avoid crashes if detection fails.

briefdescription.para: Destructor for MainWindow.

detaileddescription.para: Cleans up allocated resources including UI and camera handles. Prevents memory leaks and ensures a clean shutdown.

briefdescription.para: Logs Kilobot (or other robots) positions, LED colors, and velocities to the log file.

detaileddescription.para: Useful for full behavioral logging. Each entry includes timestamp, robot index, position (x, y), LED color, and velocity vector (vx, vy).

briefdescription.para: Logs raw position data (without robot metadata) to the log file.

detaileddescription.para: Used for simpler tracking or external agents not using full Kilobot objects. Each entry includes timestamp, index, and position (x, y).

briefdescription.para: Logs Kilobot (or other robots) positions and LED colors to the log file.

detaileddescription.para: This function is used when only position and LED color are needed per robot. Each entry includes timestamp, robot index, position (x, y), and LED color.

briefdescription.para: Slot triggered when the capturing button is clicked.

detaileddescription.para: Starts or stops camera or video capture based on UI state. Initializes the capture source (camera or video), configures size parameters, and resets the heatmap. Also updates the UI text and button label accordingly.

briefdescription.para: Converts an integer (015) to its hexadecimal string representation.

detaileddescription.para: Used for displaying or logging compact hex values from numeric inputs. Modifies the output string passed by reference.

briefdescription.para: Displays the input image on the GUI and emits image signals.

detaileddescription.para: Converts the input OpenCV frame to RGB, calls drawKilobots to render annotations, then displays the result in the GUI label. Emits signals before and after processing.

briefdescription.para: Writes user settings (e.g., window size, hue value) to disk.

detaileddescription.para: Saves GUI state to persistent storage under "SCIoI" application group. Currently includes window size and slider value.

briefdescription.para: Reads saved user settings from disk.

detaileddescription.para: Loads GUI state from previous session. Only the hue value is currently used. Resize and slider re-trigger are present as commented-out TODOs.

briefdescription.para: Utility function to display debug messages in the GUI text output.

detaileddescription.para: Allows internal status or error messages to be shown to the user via the interface.

briefdescription.para: Processes received robot data and updates internal state.

detaileddescription.para: Accepts a list of Kilobots (or other robot instances), maps their positions into arena coordinates, and updates internal world model data (positions, traces, and which robots should be enlightened). Emits kilobot position vector for downstream modules.

briefdescription.para: Receives a list of drawn circles to overlay on the video frame.

detaileddescription.para: Used to annotate the GUI with circular visual indicators (e.g., targets, zones).

briefdescription.para: Draws graphical overlays (like circles and optional labels) on top of a frame.

detaileddescription.para: Handles both transparent and opaque overlays based on drawnCircle data. Supports future extensions for drawn lines (currently commented out).

briefdescription.para: Renders Kilobots (or other robots) on the video frame.

detaileddescription.para: Displays robot positions as colored circles, optionally with velocity vectors and IDs. Heatmap and color options depend on GUI checkboxes. This function integrates robot state, visual encoding, and conditional overlays.

briefdescription.para: Draws and updates a heatmap based on robot positions.

detaileddescription.para: For each Kilobot (or robot), draws a colored circle on a heatmap layer using the robot's LED color. This overlay is then blended with the GUI video feed to visualize collective activity over time.

briefdescription.para: Detects and maps marker positions between camera and arena coordinates.

detaileddescription.para: Uses bounding rectangles and centers of four detected markers to compute perspective transforms (camera-to-arena and arena-to-camera). Updates the experimental field boundaries accordingly.

briefdescription.para: Slot triggered when 'From Video' radio button is selected.

detaileddescription.para: Currently only used for toggling UI elements (partially implemented).

briefdescription.para: Slot triggered when 'From Camera' radio button is selected.

detaileddescription.para: Currently only used for toggling UI elements (partially implemented).

briefdescription.para: Rotates the input image based on the specified flag.

detaileddescription.para: Flags: 0 = 90 clockwise 1 = 180 2 = 90 counterclockwise

briefdescription.para: Handles mouse press events to start drawing a selection box.

detaileddescription.para: If the press occurs within a valid area, initializes a rubber band rectangle at the cursor position.

briefdescription.para: Handles mouse movement while drawing a selection box.

detaileddescription.para: Updates the geometry of the rubber band rectangle or hides it if the area is invalid.

briefdescription.para: Handles mouse release events used for defining a cropping region.

detaileddescription.para: If the mouse position is valid, captures the rubber band (selection box) position and updates UI elements and internal cropping rectangle accordingly.

briefdescription.para: Checks whether the given (x,y) position is within the allowed area for selection.

detaileddescription.para: Selection is limited to the region inside the output display label, accounting for mouse bias.

briefdescription.para: Opens a file dialog for selecting a settings file.

detaileddescription.para: The chosen file path is displayed in the user interface for further use.

briefdescription.para: Updates the rotation index based on user selection.

detaileddescription.para: Also updates a text output label to show the selected index.

briefdescription.para: Starts or stops saving of raw and processed video streams.

detaileddescription.para: If the button is checked, initializes video writers and starts saving based on the current settings. Otherwise, stops and releases video writer threads and related connections.

briefdescription.para: Initialize UI elements and connect signals and slots.

detaileddescription.para: Sets initial UI states, configures sliders and buttons, connects UI elements to their respective handlers using Qt's signal/slot mechanism. Also initializes logging paths and camera source selection.

briefdescription.para: Plots a new data point on the QCustomPlot.

detaileddescription.para:
Updates the plot's x-axis range based on elapsed time and triggers a replot.
customPlot
Pointer to the QCustomPlot widget to update.
value
The new data value to plot (not currently used in this implementation).

briefdescription.para: Initializes the QCustomPlot for error visualization.

detaileddescription.para: Sets up two graphs ("Err Prec" and "Err True") for precision and trueness errors, configures time-based x-axis, y-axis range, legend, and visual customizations for each graph. Also adjusts margins and inset layout for optimal display.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the QCustomPlot widget to initialize.

briefdescription.para: Resets the heatmap overlay to a blank state.

detaileddescription.para: Clears the heatmap by initializing it to a black (zeroed) matrix matching the current capture size. Used to restart heatmap accumulation.

briefdescription.para: Maps a QPoint using provided scale and bias.

detaileddescription.para:
Applies a linear transformation to point P: scale and then bias.
P
Original point.
scale
2D scaling factors.
bias
2D bias/offset to add.
Transformed QPoint.

briefdescription.para: Maps a QPoint using a 3x3 projective transformation matrix.

detaileddescription.para:
Applies a homography (projective transform) to the input point.
P
Original point.
lambda
3x3 transformation matrix (homography).
Transformed QPoint.

briefdescription.para: Maps a QPoint using a 3x3 matrix and translation vector.

detaileddescription.para:
Applies an affine or rigid transform (matrix and translation) to the point.
P
Original point.
rvec
3x3 transformation matrix.
tvec
Translation vector.
Transformed QPoint.

briefdescription.para: Main application window for the LARS system.

detaileddescription.para: Handles all GUI events, robot tracking, data logging, and interface to the overhead controller.
